mapper.select: select rv_num ,rv_target ,rv_sender ,rv_star ,rv_review from tpReview where rv_target = #{rv_target}
select rv_num ,rv_target ,rv_sender ,rv_star ,rv_review from tpReview where rv_sender = #{rv_sender}
select rv_num ,rv_target ,rv_sender ,rv_star ,rv_review from tpReview where rv_num = #{rv_num}
mapper.update: update tpteacher set tc_avg = (select round(avg(r.rv_star),1) as tc_avg from tpreview r ,tpteacher t where r.rv_target = t.tc_id)
update tpstudent set st_avg = (select round(avg(r.rv_star),1) as st_avg from tpreview r ,tpstudent s where r.rv_target = s.st_id)
